item.title: Obtaining an Atlassian Trial License
item.description: Obtaining an Atlassian Trial License If you don’t have an existing Atlassian account, head here to sign up for an account. You’ll have to provide an email address and perform a validation check. Once you’ve complete that, you’ll be taken to the following screen. Scroll down and click New Trial License. On the next screen, be sure to choose Jira Software from the dropdown. Select the Cloud option. On the next screen, select any additional products you’d like to add to the trial, and then click Next.
